name: GraviShift
description:
Use gravity to control the character's movement and reach the end point, avoiding hazards such as spikes and radiation expose..

The levels can be completed by manipulating various game elements such as buttons, switches, timers, and platforms, as well as altering the size and shape of the character and navigating through surfaces with different properties like elasticity and slipperiness.

Complete achievements to earn new skins for customazing your box/circle.

The game was created by 15 y.o. Ukrainian.

#StandWithUkraine
